mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMENT (ID, MEMBER_ID, POST_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{postId}, #{commentContent})
mapper.select: SELECT TBC.ID, TBC.MEMBER_ID, TBC.POST_ID, TBC.COMMENT_CONTENT, TBM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_PHONE, TBM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TBM.MEMBER_ZIPCODE, TBM.MEMBER_ADDRESS, TBM.MEMBER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, TBM.MEMBER_FILE_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_FILE_PATH, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_COLOR FROM TBL_COMMENT TBC JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBC.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_POST TBP ON TBC.POST_ID = TBP.ID WHERE POST_ID = #{postId};
